title: US Auto Insurance Price Comparison Site RateForce Leaks Massive PII Data
description:
By Habiba Rashid

The leaked database contained a staggering 96,175 folders that housed 255,756 records, totaling a size of 93.93 GB.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: US Auto Insurance Price Comparison Site RateForce Leaks Massive PII Data

title: US Military Personnel Targeted by Unsolicited Smartwatches Linked to Data Breaches
description:
By Waqas

Service members in the United States military have been receiving unsolicited smartwatches through the mail, which unsurprisingly contain malware.
